; --------------------------------------
; Binary to decimal conversion for printing.
;
; This program works from 0 to 9999.

; Input immediate values are stored at:
+ Low byte
++      13:00000000 00001101: 00000010 : 02:002 > immediate:  2 : 2
+ Low byte
++      16:00000000 00010000: 00000001 : 01:001 > immediate:  1 : 1

The above has the value, 258 = 256 + 2  = 00000001:00000010

; Decimal digits are stored at:
++     237:00000000 11101101: 00000000 : 00:000 > dbbyte: 0
++     238:00000000 11101110: 00000000 : 00:000 > dbbyte: 0
++     239:00000000 11101111: 00000000 : 00:000 > dbbyte: 0
++     240:00000000 11110000: 00000000 : 00:000 > dbbyte: 0

; --------------------------------------
; Successful run:
+ Download complete.
?- + r, RUN.
?- + runProcessor()

+++ Print bytes as binary and decimal number strings.
Decimal: 0258
++ HALT, host_read_status_led_WAIT() = 0

; --------------------------------------
+ Print Program Bytes and description.
++ Address:16-bit bytes       databyte :hex:oct > description
++       0:00000000 00000000: 00110001 : 31:061 > opcode: lxi sp,STACK
++       1:00000000 00000001: 00010001 : 11:021 > lb: 17
++       2:00000000 00000010: 00000001 : 01:001 > hb: 1
++       3:00000000 00000011: 00100001 : 21:041 > opcode: lxi h,StartMsg
